Module kivakit.core.network.email

Class EmailQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.network.email.EmailQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    class EmailQueue
extends java.lang.Object
implements Closeable
    A simple email queue implemented with ArrayBlockingQueue, with no persistent backing.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
